languages.text: В первые минуты молитвы многие падают замертво, не в силах противиться скверне, однако их место тут же занимают другие, не обращая внимание на то, как их товарищи за секунды истлевают в пыль. Затем волна тошнотворного смрада окутывает корабельные палубы, заставляя людей выблевывать собственные внутренности. И вот — на всех палубах гаснет свет. Призраки прошлого бродят среди живых, отнимая дыхание у слабых духом. И все же молебен не угасает.

traits.locale_text: В первые минуты молитвы многие падают замертво, не в силах противиться скверне, однако их место тут же занимают другие, не обращая внимание на то, как их товарищи за секунды истлевают в пыль. Затем волна тошнотворного смрада окутывает корабельные палубы, заставляя людей выблевывать собственные внутренности. И вот — на всех палубах гаснет свет. Призраки прошлого бродят среди живых, отнимая дыхание у слабых духом. И все же молебен не угасает.

languages.text: Many drop dead during the first minutes of the prayer, unable to resist the corruption; however, others immediately take their place, unfazed by the sight of their fellows turning to dust in seconds. Then a nauseating stench engulfs the ship's decks like a wave, causing people to retch forth their innards. Finally, every deck is plunged into darkness. Ghosts of the past walk among the living, stealing breath from those weak of spirit. And still the prayer is not extinguished.
languages.original_text: В первые минуты молитвы многие падают замертво, не в силах противиться скверне, однако их место тут же занимают другие, не обращая внимание на то, как их товарищи за секунды истлевают в пыль. Затем волна тошнотворного смрада окутывает корабельные палубы, заставляя людей выблевывать собственные внутренности. И вот — на всех палубах гаснет свет. Призраки прошлого бродят среди живых, отнимая дыхание у слабых духом. И все же молебен не угасает.

traits.locale_text: Many drop dead during the first minutes of the prayer, unable to resist the corruption; however, others immediately take their place, unfazed by the sight of their fellows turning to dust in seconds. Then a wave of nauseating stench engulfs the ship's decks, causing people to retch their innards up. Finally, lights go out on all decks. Ghosts of the past walk among the living, stealing breath from those weak of spirit. And yet the prayer is not extinguished.

languages.text: 祈祷才仅仅维持几分钟，就有无数人因无法抵抗腐化而丧命。然而，其他人立刻取代了他们的位置，毫不在意他们的同伴在几秒钟之内化为尘土的情形。随后，一股令人作呕的恶臭，仿佛波浪一样吞没了舰船的甲板，船员们甚至连内脏都吐了出来。到了最后，每层甲板都陷入了黑暗。来自过去的幽灵在活人之中走来走去，扼住了那些精神脆弱之人的喉咙。但即便如此，祈祷依然没有停歇。
languages.original_text: Many drop dead during the first minutes of the prayer, unable to resist the corruption; however, others immediately take their place, unfazed by the sight of their fellows turning to dust in seconds. Then a nauseating stench engulfs the ship's decks like a wave, causing people to retch forth their innards. Finally, every deck is plunged into darkness. Ghosts of the past walk among the living, stealing breath from those weak of spirit. And still the prayer is not extinguished.

traits.locale_text: 祈祷才仅仅维持几分钟，就有无数人因无法抵抗腐化而丧命。然而，其他人立刻取代了他们的位置，毫不在意他们的同伴在几秒钟之内化为尘土的情形。随后，一股令人作呕的恶臭，仿佛波浪一样吞没了舰船的甲板，船员们甚至连内脏都吐了出来。到了最后，每层甲板都陷入了黑暗。来自过去的幽灵在活人之中走来走去，扼住了那些精神脆弱之人的喉咙。但即便如此，祈祷依然没有停歇。

languages.text: Muchos caen muertos durante los primeros minutos de la oración, incapaces de resistir la corrupción, pero otros ocupan sus lugares al instante, impávidos ante la imagen de sus compañeros convirtiéndose en polvo. De repente, una peste nauseabunda azota las cubiertas de la nave como una ola, haciendo que la gente expulse el contenido de sus estómagos. Finalmente, todas las cubiertas quedan sumidas en la oscuridad. Los fantasmas del pasado caminan entre los vivos, arrebatando el aliento a los débiles de espíritu. Y aun así, la oración no se detiene.
languages.original_text: Many drop dead during the first minutes of the prayer, unable to resist the corruption; however, others immediately take their place, unfazed by the sight of their fellows turning to dust in seconds. Then a nauseating stench engulfs the ship's decks like a wave, causing people to retch forth their innards. Finally, every deck is plunged into darkness. Ghosts of the past walk among the living, stealing breath from those weak of spirit. And still the prayer is not extinguished.

traits.locale_text: Muchos caen muertos durante los primeros minutos de la oración, incapaces de resistir la corrupción, pero otros ocupan sus lugares al instante, impávidos ante la imagen de sus compañeros convirtiéndose en polvo. De repente, una peste nauseabunda azota las cubiertas de la nave como una ola, haciendo que la gente expulse el contenido de sus estómagos. Finalmente, todas las cubiertas quedan sumidas en la oscuridad. Los fantasmas del pasado caminan entre los vivos, arrebatando el aliento a los débiles de espíritu. Y aun así, la oración no se detiene.

languages.text: 祈りの最初の数分間に、多くが腐敗に耐えられず死んでいった。だが数秒で塵と化す仲間の姿に動じることなく、すぐに代わりを務める者もいる。そして、吐き気を催す悪臭が波のように船の甲板を覆い、人々は内臓を吐き出すようになる。そして、すべてのデッキが暗闇に包まれる。昔の亡霊が生者の間を歩き回り、精神の弱まった者たちから息を奪っていく。それでも、祈りは消えない。
languages.original_text: Many drop dead during the first minutes of the prayer, unable to resist the corruption; however, others immediately take their place, unfazed by the sight of their fellows turning to dust in seconds. Then a nauseating stench engulfs the ship's decks like a wave, causing people to retch forth their innards. Finally, every deck is plunged into darkness. Ghosts of the past walk among the living, stealing breath from those weak of spirit. And still the prayer is not extinguished.

traits.locale_text: 祈りの最初の数分間に、多くが腐敗に耐えられず死んでいった。だが数秒で塵と化す仲間の姿に動じることなく、すぐに代わりを務める者もいる。そして、吐き気を催す悪臭が波のように船の甲板を覆い、人々は内臓を吐き出すようになる。そして、すべてのデッキが暗闇に包まれる。昔の亡霊が生者の間を歩き回り、精神の弱まった者たちから息を奪っていく。それでも、祈りは消えない。

languages.text: Viele fallen während der ersten Minuten des Gebets tot um, weil sie der Verderbnis nicht standhalten können. Andere nehmen aber augenblicklich ihren Platz ein, völlig unbeeindruckt von dem Anblick, wie ihre Kameraden innerhalb weniger Sekunden in Staub verwandelt wurden. Dann spült ein widerwärtiger Gestank über die Decks des Schiffs, durch den die Leute ihre Innereien herausspeien. Schließlich werden sämtliche Decks in Dunkelheit getaucht. Geister der Vergangenheit wandeln unter den Lebenden, stehlen den Willensschwachen den Atem. Und dennoch erlischt das Gebet nicht.
languages.original_text: Many drop dead during the first minutes of the prayer, unable to resist the corruption; however, others immediately take their place, unfazed by the sight of their fellows turning to dust in seconds. Then a nauseating stench engulfs the ship's decks like a wave, causing people to retch forth their innards. Finally, every deck is plunged into darkness. Ghosts of the past walk among the living, stealing breath from those weak of spirit. And still the prayer is not extinguished.

traits.locale_text: Viele fallen während der ersten Minuten des Gebets tot um, weil sie der Verderbnis nicht standhalten können. Andere nehmen aber augenblicklich ihren Platz ein, völlig unbeeindruckt von dem Anblick, wie ihre Kameraden innerhalb weniger Sekunden in Staub verwandelt wurden. Dann spült ein widerwärtiger Gestank über die Decks des Schiffs, durch den die Leute ihre Innereien herausspeien. Schließlich werden sämtliche Decks in Dunkelheit getaucht. Geister der Vergangenheit wandeln unter den Lebenden, stehlen den Willensschwachen den Atem. Und dennoch erlischt das Gebet nicht.

languages.text: Beaucoup meurent dès les premières minutes de la prière, incapables de résister à la corruption. Mais d'autres prennent immédiatement leur place, impassibles à la vue de leurs camarades qui tombent en poussière au bout de quelques secondes. Une puanteur infecte envahit un à un les ponts du vaisseau, forçant les gens à vomir leurs entrailles. Enfin, tous les ponts sont plongés dans l'obscurité. Des fantômes du passé marchent parmi les vivants, volant le souffle des esprits faibles. Mais la prière ne perd pas en intensité.
languages.original_text: Many drop dead during the first minutes of the prayer, unable to resist the corruption; however, others immediately take their place, unfazed by the sight of their fellows turning to dust in seconds. Then a nauseating stench engulfs the ship's decks like a wave, causing people to retch forth their innards. Finally, every deck is plunged into darkness. Ghosts of the past walk among the living, stealing breath from those weak of spirit. And still the prayer is not extinguished.

languages.text: Birçokları, duanın ilk dakikalarında yozlaşmaya direnemeyip ölse de yoldaşlarının saniyeler içinde toza dönüşmesine aldırmayan başkaları, hemen yerlerini alıyor. Sonrasındaysa geminin güvertelerini dalga gibi saran mide bulandırıcı bir koku, insanları kusarak içlerini boşaltmaya zorluyor. Sonunda her güverte karanlığa gömülüyor. Geçmişin hayaletleri, yaşayanlar arasında dolaşıyor ve ruhu zayıf olanların nefesini çalıyor. Buna rağmen ayin sona ermiyor.
languages.original_text: Many drop dead during the first minutes of the prayer, unable to resist the corruption; however, others immediately take their place, unfazed by the sight of their fellows turning to dust in seconds. Then a nauseating stench engulfs the ship's decks like a wave, causing people to retch forth their innards. Finally, every deck is plunged into darkness. Ghosts of the past walk among the living, stealing breath from those weak of spirit. And still the prayer is not extinguished.
